title: Installed caffe2 through conda install, but imdb is disabled
body_html:
I installed the caffe2 through the anaconda3
conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7

Everything is fine but the lmdb.
When I try the caffe2 tutorial CIFAR10_Part1, I met the problem:

RuntimeError: [enforce fail at db.h:190] db_. Cannot open db: .....
I read the forums and find that's because lmdb is not turned on by compiling.
But I just used the conda install.
So I try to turn on the lmdb and compile the source with the command

./build_anaconda.sh --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7 --install-locally -DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-5

But I got the Error likes following:

caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/build.make:63: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/utils/caffe2_gpu_generated_math_gpu.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/utils/caffe2_gpu_generated_math_gpu.cu.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1440: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

How could I solve the problem? Thanks!

System Info

  • Caffe2
  • How you installed Caffe2 (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source): ./build_anaconda.sh --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7 --install-locally -DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-5
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Python version: 2.7
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0
  • GPU models and configuration: 1070
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 6

Everything is fine but the lmdb.
When I try the caffe2 tutorial CIFAR10_Part1, I met the problem:

body:
I installed the caffe2 through the anaconda3
`conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7`

Everything is fine but the lmdb.
When I try the caffe2 tutorial CIFAR10_Part1, I met the problem:

`RuntimeError: [enforce fail at db.h:190] db_. Cannot open db: .....`
I read the forums and find that's because lmdb is not turned on by compiling.
But I just used the conda install.
So I try to turn on the lmdb and compile the source with the command 

`./build_anaconda.sh --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7 --install-locally -DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-5
`

But I got the Error likes following:
```
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/build.make:63: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/utils/caffe2_gpu_generated_math_gpu.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/utils/caffe2_gpu_generated_math_gpu.cu.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1440: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

```
How could I solve the problem? Thanks!

## System Info

- Caffe2
- How you installed Caffe2 (conda, pip, source): conda
- Build command you used (if compiling from source): `./build_anaconda.sh --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7 --install-locally -DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-5`
- OS: Ubuntu 18.04
- Python version: 2.7
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0
- GPU models and configuration: 1070
- GCC version (if compiling from source): 6
